primitives

Class SegmentsIntersect

  • java.lang.Object
    • primitives.SegmentsIntersect

  • public class SegmentsIntersect
extends java.lang.Object
    Determines whether the two given segments intersect in O(1), as depicted in "Introduction to Algorithms" by T.Cormen et al.
